TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void GiveFeedbackEventHandler(object sender, GiveFeedbackEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed GiveFeedbackEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub GiveFeedbackEventHandler(sender As Object, e As GiveFeedbackEventArgs)
public delegate void GiveFeedbackEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, GiveFeedbackEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: sender
param.span: 附加事件處理常式的物件。

span.span: The object where the event handler is attached.

summary.span: 代表將處理來自同處理序拖放作業之意見反應路由事件的方法，例如 。

span.span: Represents a method that will handle the feedback routed event from in-process drag-and-drop operations, for instance .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個委派會使用與下列附加事件。This delegate is used with the following attached events. - - 此委派，也會使用與基底項目上的下列路由事件。This delegate is also used with the following routed events on base elements. 這些路由的事件轉送，使其更容易存取一般項目模型中先前所列的附加的事件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. - - - - 附加的事件和基底的項目路由事件共用其事件資料，而反昇和通道之路由事件的版本也共用事件資料。The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data. 事件路由傳送，這可能會影響事件的處理的特性。This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For details, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 拖放作業開始時，就會發生附加的事件。The attached event occurs when a drag-and-drop operation is started. 附加的事件可讓來源的拖曳事件修改滑鼠指標以使用者提供的視覺化回饋，拖放作業期間的外觀。The attached event enables the source of a drag event to modify the appearance of the mouse pointer to provide the user with visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation.
